price: 9. Tokitisaki bokundoli (kurani) na bosôló, тре sé biso nde tobatelaka yango.
arabic: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نَزَّلۡنَا ٱلذِّكۡرَ وَإِنَّا لَهُۥ لَحَٰفِظُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: innā naḥnu nazzalnā al-dhik'ra wa-innā lahu laḥāfiẓūna
